about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the eerie realm of the Backrooms, brought to life with stunning realism through the power of Unreal Engine 5. Navigate through intricately designed levels filled with puzzles to solve, all while evading relentless entities that lurk in the shadows. Dare to explore, strategize, and survive as you journey deeper into the haunting unknown.

Unique Level and Monster Design
There is a reason why this is titled a slightly different Backrooms:
Each corridor holds a new surprise, each monster a unique terror to overcome that you haven't seen in any other Backrooms. The Level Design is 100% Custom, besided some classics like level 0. Prepare for an adventure where the only constant is the spine-chilling thrill of the unknown.


Co-op Multiplayer
Embark on a heart-pounding journey with up to 4 players in the Backrooms. Work together to solve Puzzles, Scream together if you're allowed to and use Features like Rock-Paper-Scissors to deside who should enter the haunting corridor first!


Proximity Voice Chat
Engage in strategic communication with your teammates using proximity voice chat, but tread carefully; lurking entities may eavesdrop and track your whereabouts.

name: A slightly different Backrooms

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 7th Gen
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Gtx 1060
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: A slightly different Backrooms is a Coop or Singleplayer Horror Puzzle Game. Encounter different Monsters and Levels than in the other Backrooms, but brace yourself for the same bone-chilling atmosphere like the typical ones.
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
